item.description:
Note that this walk will be 9:30-11 instead of the usual 10:30-12.


Join us on Sunday, July 10, from 9:30 a.m. until 11 AM for a walk on a paved walking/jogging trail in Woodbridge followed by optional lunch. Fitzgerald Trails is located at 100 Center Road in Woodbridge, Connecticut, and there’s plenty of parking at the Woodbridge Town Library at 10 Newton Road. If you stand in front of the library with the entrance behind you, in front of you will be the main parking lot and across the street you will see a white building with green trim. Walk to the street (which is Center Road) and cross to the other side of the street where the white building is. Turn left and walk about 50 yards.The walking trail will be on your right. We will meet on the walking trail adjacent to Center Road. If you arrive after 9:30 a.m., just wait at this location and you will see us in a few minutes as we walk around the track. You can also try calling Manny Ratafia on his cell phone at 203-901-9553 or Nina
Stein on her cell phone at 203-215-0022. Afterward, some of us will go to a nearby diner or other restaurant for lunch. The event will be canceled in the event of rain. If in doubt about the weather, contact Manny Ratafia: e-mail: manny@ratafias.com, hm 203-387-7348, mobile 203-901-9553 or Nina Stein hm 203-757-2539, mobile 203-215-0022.

For the latest updates on this event and our other events, join our e-mail announcements list at: www.cthumanist.org (Click on "Lists" in the column on the left of the page then click on "HAC-announce").
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet on the walking trail adjacent to Center Road.
item.name: Woodbridge Walk
